attributes.action: Pressure the London Olympic Games Organising Committee to consider Iron Maiden to open the 2012 Olympic games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Iron Maiden are amongst the most successful and long-living bands the UK has ever produced. 2012 will mark the 30th anniversary of their first major success with the album 'Number of the Beast' and their career started in the pubs and clubs of London.
We who have signed this petition can see NO other bands or artists the UK could possibly offer who are more fitting, or deserving of the honnour of a part in the opening of the 2012 Olympic Games in London.

rejection.details: The London Olympic Games Organising Committee is independent of government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
